name: Carpocalypse (Tapio Vähä-Vahe, bug treefrog)
description:
Made in 8 hours for Taitaja2022 semifinals.

You need to survive as long as possible from the zombie apocalypse. Use your mounted machine gun for help. Don't run out of gas or it's game over d:)

(Web version can be funky if it doesn't work download the game)
